186684.<speed=0>\n今回のターンの行動は\n「たたかう」\nでよろしいですか？:
<speed=0>
Use the "Fight" action for this turn?
<yesno><break>

186685.<speed=0>\n使えるどうぐは もう残っていません。:
<speed=0>
There are no items left to use.

187424.<pipipi_high>\n「これで このターンの行動が\n 『たたかう』に:
The action decided for this turn is "Fight"!
Once all players' actions have been chosen, Batoen will act in order starting from the highest Agility.
In other words, if your Agility is high, you'll get to act sooner more often! Make sure to check your Agility!

187425.<pipipi_high>\n「見事な『チェンジアタック』でしたわ！\n<br>:
Nice job with that Change Attack!
You can use the "Change" command 3 times in a one-on-one battle, and 2 times in a Free Battle.
Change Attacks can be very powerful, so make sure to use them at the most opportune moment!
Well, this is the end of my explanation.
If you need to brush up again, you can check "How to Play" in the Batoen Launcher.
From what I've seen, I have a feeling that you'll be an excellent Batoen Fighter!

187427.<pipipi_high>\n「『チェンジアタック』は\n それぞれのバトエンの:
A "Change Attack" is a Batoen's action listed at the very top.
When doing a Change Attack, make sure to carefully check the Batoen you're changing into!

187428.<pipipi_high>\n「今 お手持ちの どうぐ消しゴムは\n 『上やくそ:
The Item Erasers you have now are "Strong Medicine" and "Love Chocolate".
Use Strong Medicine if you need to recover, and Love Chocolate if you plan to attack.
Choose whichever you like!

187431.<pipipi_high>\n「まずは バトエンファイトの基本となる\n 『たた:
The "Fight" command is the basis of any Batoen Fight.
After choosing "Fight", your Batoen will perform one of its 6 actions.
So then, please choose the "Fight" command.

187433.<pipipi_high>\n「これで『たたかう』コマンドについては\n だいた:
Using the "Fight" command is pretty easy, right?
Next, I'll explain how to use the "Items" command.

187434.<pipipi_high>\n「では これから バトエンファイトで使える\n ３:
<pipipi_high>
Now, I will explain the 3 different commands
you can use during a Batoen Fight.
<pipipi_off><end>

<speed=0>
You will lose due to not winning
in the limited amount of turns.
<auto_bw=5000><close>

<speed=0>
The turn limit has been reached. Winners
will be decided from number of remaining Batoen.
<auto_br=5000>
If the numbers are the same, the player with
the highest total HP remaining will be
the winner.
<auto_bw=5000><close>

188000.<speed=0>\n<%sL_ERASER_NAME>は\n今回のバトエンファ:
<speed=0>
<%sL_ERASER_NAME> can't be used in this
Batoen Fight.

190102.<pipipi_high>\n「『どうぐ』コマンドは\n どうぐ消しゴムを 使う:
The "Items" command allows you to use an Item Eraser.
You're able to bring 2 Item Erasers to a battle.
However, each eraser can only be used once per Batoen Fight. Use them in a pinch or to turn a battle in your favor.
Now, please select the "Items" command.

190103.<pipipi_high>\n「『どうぐ』コマンドについては\n ご理解いただけ:
Looks like you've gotten the hang of the "Items" command!
You'll get back any Erasers you used once the battle is over, so don't worry about using them.
Now, I will lecture you on the "Change" command.
The "Change" command allows you to swap your Batoen on the field with one in your hand.
It's a very important action that will allow you to perform a "Change Attack"!
Now, please select the "Change" command.
